Legal_Issue: Was the Board's negative credibility finding patently unreasonable, and did it err in failing to conduct a separate section 97 analysis?
Procedural_Context: Judicial review under section 72 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Credibility_Assessment: Negative credibility finding based on inconsistencies, lack of corroboration, and contradictory versions of events
Evidence_Type: Testimonial evidence, lack of corroborative evidence
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies, omissions, contradictions, and implausibilities in testimony
Application_Error: Failure to conduct a separate section 97 analysis
Legal_Standard: Patent unreasonableness standard for credibility findings
Decision_Outcome: Refusal of refugee claim based on lack of credibility
Decision_Review_Issue: Credibility assessment and omission of section 97 analysis
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Section 97 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Cause_of_Refusal: Omissions, contradictions, and implausibilities in testimony
Credibility_Issues: Inconsistent statements, contradictory accounts, implausible narrative
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to credibility finding and request for section 97 analysis
Procedural_Issue: Alleged failure to conduct separate section 97 analysis
Omission_Type: Failure to provide consistent and complete account of events
